decision_title: Conditional-Go — Draft Module 2.6 at Risk Pending Final Study Report (Kasturi pattern)

target_product_profile.development_stage_relevance: IND compilation (Module 2 summaries pending final nonclinical reports)

decision_question: Can we proceed with Draft 1 of Module 2.6 using controlled placeholders for the pending Study-07 final report, with explicit verification, review routing, and a contingency plan if the report is late or changes materially?

options_considered.description: Proceed with Draft 1 using placeholders for Study-07; lock verification and triage review routing.
options_considered.estimated_impact: On-time Draft 1; manageable residual risk if conditions and routing are enforced.

options_considered.description: Wait for Study-07 final report before drafting Module 2.6.
cons: Likely slips Draft 1 and compresses downstream review cycles
options_considered.estimated_impact: Higher immediate certainty; higher schedule risk.

conditions.condition: Receive Study-07 final report (QA released) and reconcile all placeholder text/values in Module 2.6 within 24 hours.
conditions.evidence_to_close: Study-07 final report + reconciliation memo + updated Module 2.6 draft stored in controlled location

conditions.condition: Run consistency check across Module 2.6 and referenced tables/appendices; log discrepancies and resolution.
conditions.evidence_to_close: Consistency check checklist + discrepancy log with signed resolution

decision_outcome.rationale_summary: Drafting Module 2.6 now preserves the IND timeline while acknowledging a known rate-limiting input (Study-07 final report). The risk is acceptable because placeholders are limited in scope, verification criteria are explicit, reviewer routing is pre-defined for late changes, and a contingency plan is in place if the report is delayed or materially different from preliminary outputs.

risk_posture.justification: Regulatory-facing summaries must be consistent and traceable; drafting at risk is acceptable only with strict verification and fast reconciliation once the final report is available.
known_unknowns: Final QA release timing for Study-07
Magnitude of deltas between preliminary outputs and final report
tradeoffs: Accept controlled placeholder drafting to protect schedule while increasing review routing overhead near the deadline.

author_at_risk_items.verification_source: Study-07 final report (QA released) + appendix tables
author_at_risk_items.acceptance_criteria: All placeholders replaced; values and narratives match the final report; traceability links updated; no unresolved discrepancies remain.
author_at_risk_items.fallback_plan: If the Study-07 final report is not received by the deadline, escalate to decision_owner and switch to a defer-with-required-evidence posture for Module 2.6 finalization; submit Draft 1 with placeholders clearly flagged and restrict downstream dependencies until closure.

review_plan.rationale: Late-breaking changes from Study-07 impact regulatory-facing summaries; required reviewers cover scientific accuracy, quality consistency, and regulatory positioning.
review_plan.escalation_path: If required reviewers do not respond within 24 hours, escalate to decision_owner for delegated authority signoff; document rationale in audit change log.

scope_change_events.description: Sponsor notified the team that Study-07 final report QA release will occur after Draft 1 kickoff.
scope_change_events.notes: Accepted with explicit author-at-risk controls and triage review routing.

fallback_plan.trigger: Study-07 final report not received by 2026-01-09 or material deltas require rework beyond the 24-hour review window.
actions: Escalate to decision_owner and convene a same-day triage with required reviewers.
Freeze downstream documents that depend on the affected summaries until reconciliation is approved.
If timeline risk is critical, re-baseline submission plan and log a change request; document rationale for any residual placeholder content.
fallback_plan.time_cost_estimate: 1–5 days depending on delta severity; may require change request and schedule re-baseline.

evidence_items.title: Drafting-at-risk plan for Module 2.6 (placeholder controls)
evidence_items.quality_notes: Reviewed by Regulatory and QA for control completeness.

evidence_items.title: Study-07 preliminary output package (non-QA)
evidence_items.quality_notes: Preliminary outputs; may change upon QA release.

gaps.gap: Study-07 final QA-released report is not available at Draft 1 kickoff.
gaps.impact: Placeholders required; late deltas could compress review time.
gaps.mitigation_plan: Use author_at_risk_items controls; enforce 24-hour reconciliation + review plan; fallback_plan if missed.

assumptions.assumption: Preliminary Study-07 outputs will not materially change upon QA release.
assumptions.risk_if_wrong: Module 2.6 summaries may require rework and re-review.
assumptions.how_to_verify: Compare preliminary outputs to final report; log deltas and obtain required reviewer signoff.

key_risks.risk: Late Study-07 final report triggers compressed review and potential inconsistency.
key_risks.mitigation: Pre-define review routing and reconciliation timebox; escalate if missed.

risk_assessment.residual_risk_statement: Residual risk is acceptable only if reconciliation and required reviews occur within the defined timebox; otherwise decision must be revisited.

approvals.comments: Proceed with controlled placeholders; enforce reconciliation and triage routing.

final_signoff.notes: Conditional-go approved with explicit author-at-risk and fallback controls.

actions.description: Create placeholder reconciliation checklist for Module 2.6.

change_log.summary: Created decision record with author-at-risk controls and fallback plan (v1.2 additions).
